Name: Josh Robertson
Title: Director of Operations
About:
I lead the day-to-day operations of Smashing Boxes as the Director of Operations. A veteran of Operation Iraqi Freedom and Operation Enduring Freedom, I served as a Naval Officer for 13 years in both an Active Duty and Reserve capacity.

Prior to joining Smashing Boxes I was a member of the leadership team for two technology startups. I also consulted as a subject matter expert on projects for the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA), United States Special Operations Command (SOCOM) and the Department of the Navy (DoN).
